Row.Text: [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus.

The Satrap's Court is the Persian unique Building. It replaces the Bank. The Satrap's Court increases the city's output of wealth more than the Bank, and it also increases the Civilization's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. The City must have a Market before the Satrap's Court may be constructed.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Satrap's Court is the Persian unique Building. It replaces the Bank. The Satrap's Court increases the city's output of wealth more than the Bank, and it also increases the Civilization's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. The City must have a Market before the Satrap's Court may be constructed.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]The Satrap's Court is the Persian unique Building. It replaces the Bank. The Satrap's Court increases the city's output of wealth more than the Bank, and it also increases the Civilization's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. The City must have a Market before the Satrap's Court may be constructed.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Satrap's Court is the Persian unique Building. It replaces the Bank. The Satrap's Court increases the city's output of wealth more than the Bank, and it also increases the Civilization's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness. The City must have a Market before the Satrap's Court may be constructed.

City must have a Market. Provides more [ICON_GOLD] Gold than the Bank it replaces. Trade Routes other players make to a City with a Satrap's Court will generate an extra 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the City owner and the Trade Route owner gains an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the Trade Route.
